title: Error Detection & Correction
subject: Computer Organization
theory:
Ensuring data integrity. 
- **Parity**: Adds 1 bit. Detects 1-bit error. 
- **Hamming Code**: Detects 2-bit, Corrects 1-bit error. 
- **CRC**: Cyclic Redundancy Check (Disk/Network).

real_world_use_cases.description: Server memory uses Hamming codes to prevent crash from cosmic rays.
